name: DART that TARGET
description:
DART that TARGET, an arcade darts game!

Enjoy a darts videogame arcade experience! Collect special items to improve your results and make incredible combos! 

A carefully hand-crafted design with detailed graphics and an immersive gameplay;  original soundtrack specially composed for this game! You will feel like in a real pub!

Choose players, choose your favourite game and let's DART that TARGET!

FEATURES:

  • Up to 4 players in a single device (local multiplayer)!
  • 10 different Dart games: x301x, x501x, Cricket and many more.
  • Many special items to collect and play an arcade experience
  • Unique design to feel like in a real bar playing with friends
  • Original soundtrack for a completely immersive experience

CONTROLS:

Game can be played with Keyboard/Mouse.

  • Mouse movement -> Move the cursor pointer around the target
  • Mouse Right Button -> Shot the dart | Toggle items activation
  • Escape Key | Back Button -> Move screen back or Exit game (if title screen)

NOTE: This game is a self-contained complete immersive experience. No user data adquisition, no advertising, no social networks sharing, no trial version and no external connection. Just enjoy this game experience like in the 80s.

WARNING: This game requires .NET 5.0 on Windows and Linux. Download it here.
